channel.title: 562 [Insidia] Some NPCs don't attack back/you push them
channel.description: So basically I'm using an Insidia source, and most of the dupes/bugs have been patched, but the PvM system was bad to begin with. The problem I'm having is that when you go to kill a monster, it won't attack back. When you kill it once successfully, it starts attacking back. I want it to automatically attack back on first hit, is there a way to do this? And also, the monsters sometimes move back a brick, and you move up a brick, when you go to attack it, so it essentially "pushes" the monster back and you can't attack it. Is there a fix for this as well? Thanks a lot guys!

item.title: 562 [Insidia] Some NPCs don't attack back/you push them
